body: This is why I learned japanese

If you mean before this ever actually gets translated, then yeah probably. :p Seriously though, I can't understand why it hasn't been... One of the oldest Persona 3 doujinshi, and certainly one of the best, with appearances by characters who rarely see usage in erotic fanbooks and/or CG Sets. (Yuko! Also Fuuka, but mostly Yuko! <3 My two favorite girls.)
Will I really die if I ask for a translation???
